lead_paragraph: President Obama urged Congress Saturday to rewrite the rules governing campaign contributions in an effort to undo the Supreme Court's ruling in the Citizens United case earlier this year.
snippet: President Obama calls for tighter disclosure requirements on campaign contributions made by companies, unions and advocacy groups. Meanwhile, as oil spills out into the waters along the Gulf Coast, Mr. Obama plans an emergency trip to the region.
abstract: President Obama calls for tighter disclosure requirements on campaign contributions made by companies, unions and advocacy groups. Meanwhile, as oil spills out into the waters along the Gulf Coast, Mr. Obama plans an emergency trip to the region.
